title: About Me
intro: Hey! I'm Jeein, a creative software engineer who loves building intuitive applications. I enjoy combining design and code to create engaging user experiences. Passionate about problem-solving, efficiency, and creative solutions!

quest.title: PIXEL QUEST: Origin of Creativity
quest.subtitle: Explore the map, talk to NPCs, and recover memory shards to rebuild the creativity engine.

scenes.title: Scene 1. The Empty Box in Class
scenes.description: Everyone is about to throw away an empty box. What do you do first?

choices.label: Combine it with other scraps and imagine a new tool.
choices.response: You designed ideas by seeing hidden structure in ordinary materials.

choices.label: Observe where classmates struggle before touching anything.
choices.response: You captured user emotion before jumping into a solution.

choices.label: Set a one-hour timer and build a usable prototype now.
choices.response: You activated a rapid loop of trying and improving.

scenes.title: Scene 2. Everyday Friction
scenes.description: Most people ignore this tiny inconvenience, but you keep noticing it.

choices.label: Borrow an idea from a different field and remix it.
choices.response: You connected distant dots and produced a fresh solution.

choices.label: Interview users and map their emotional flow in detail.
choices.response: Understanding context first made the direction much clearer.

choices.label: Redesign your routine again and again until friction disappears.
choices.response: You chose the same persistence that drives 100+ redesigns.

scenes.title: Scene 3. Real Launch
scenes.description: Now it is time to ship. Your team waits for one key decision.

choices.label: Rebuild core flows into the most intuitive experience.
choices.response: You fused design and code into a flow users grasp instantly.

choices.label: Attach a tight feedback loop and track subtle user signals.
choices.response: You improved satisfaction by listening beyond explicit words.

choices.label: Repeat release-observe-fix cycles until metrics improve.
choices.response: You drove the product forward with relentless execution.

endings.creativity: You experienced Jeein's creativity engine most strongly. Reframing familiar things into new systems was the center of your run.
endings.sensitivity: You experienced Jeein's sensitivity most strongly. Detecting subtle friction and translating it into solutions defined your run.
endings.persistence: You experienced Jeein's persistence loop most strongly. Fast iteration and continuous refinement pushed your run to the finish.

quest.objective: Objective: Collect 3 memory shards, gather items, and unlock blocked gates.
quest.controls: Move: Arrow keys or WASD, Interact: E / Enter / Space (use buttons on mobile)
quest.sceneReady: Memory shard detected: interact to continue the story.

npcs.tinkererFirst: Hey explorer! Take this Rusty Key. It should fit the north barrier lock.
npcs.tinkererRepeat: I already gave you the key. Start with the north barrier gate.
npcs.archivistNeedLens: The east barrier needs a Signal Lens to read the frequency. Find the second memory shard first.
npcs.archivistGiveChip: Great, you found the lens. Plug this Core Chip into the east barrier console.
npcs.archivistRepeat: You already have the Core Chip. Head to the east barrier gate.

quest.mapHint: Tiles under black fog are unexplored. Press M to toggle quickly.
